repos.name: www
repos.description: A TypeScript ASCII blog with WebGL effects (this site)

repos.name: proj
repos.description: A fast, intuitive TUI project navigator for developers. Quickly browse, open, and manage your code projects from the terminal.

repos.name: switchboard
repos.description: A lightweight, zero-config dashboard for Docker. Features real-time container discovery, a responsive web UI, and optional automated Nginx reverse proxy generation.

repos.name: next-webgl-benchmark
repos.description: A high-performance WebGL visualization and benchmarking application built with Next.js, React, Three.js, and PostProcessing effects.

repos.name: ysx
repos.description: YSX - YAML syntax for React components. Build-time transpilation with zero overhead and full React 19 support.

repos.name: github-fork-manager
repos.description: TUI for listing your GitHub forks, multi-selecting, and safely bulk-deleting with confirmation and logging

repos.name: groovelab
repos.description: GrooveLab is a modern, musician-friendly toolbox for timing and theory work. Includes BPM tools, groove quantization, rhythm grids, chord and scale exploration.

repos.name: discord-clanker
repos.description: Go-based Discord bot with OpenAI-compatible LLM support, featuring RBAC, rate limiting, token counting, and Redis conversation storage.
